item.title: ApplyPal ðŸ§ - How to Build Your Own Career Advisor AI Agent!
item.description: This blog explores Agentic AI, highlighting its ability to autonomously perform personalized tasks like resume evaluation, career guidance, and application tailoring using advanced NLP models. It showcases ApplyPal, a Career Advisor AI Agent built with GPT-4, LangChain, and Streamlit
